title: Onwards to Numazu!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hanamaru-chan, thanks for waiting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Welcome to Numazu, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s been a while since Kanata has been to Numazu~. Kanata was so excited that Kanata couldn’t sleep yesterday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Fufu, actually, Maru too. There are so many places Maru wants to take you to, Kanata-san, so Maru has been thinking of a plan since yesterday zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, we’re the same, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah. Do you want to go anywhere, Kanata-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata wants to try going to the places you planned, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then, how about we go eat Numazu’s specialty hamburger first? After that, let’s go to the aquarium.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, couldn’t agree more~! Kanata is starving.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then it’s decided! We can’t fight on an empty stomach, so let’s go to the restaurant right away~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
